[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/shops/inherit/expression_util.c

This sets the thingy type. It is what is put in front of the control functions so many objects can set up exciting and confusing controls of expressions.

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/basic/expressions.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/nroff.h, /include/expressions.h and /include/shops/craft_shop.h

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
do_approve_status_functions
int do_approve_status_functions(int hints)
This method shows the status of all the user defined functions. These can be used in other exciting functions.

This method shows the status of all the user defined functions. These can be used in other exciting functions.

do_user_function_add
int do_user_function_add(string def,
string expr)
This method allows a function to be added to the base set of user functions.

Parameters:
def - the name and arguements
expr - the expression itself
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
do_user_function_remove
int do_user_function_remove(string name)
This method allows a function to be added to the base set of user functions.

Parameters:
def - the name and arguements
expr - the expression itself
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
query_expression_type
string query_expression_type()
This returns the expression type. It is what is put in front of the control functions so many objects can set up exciting and confusing controls of expressions.

Returns:
the expression type
